title: 10 Useful Mac Tips and Tricks
tags: Switching from windows to OS X
description: Hey guys, here are some MacOS tips and tricks that I use daily.   [Video Content]  1. Shift + Minimize 2. Text Clipping - Copy Text and drag it to home screen 3. Tap and hold the green button 4. Space bar for preview and uploading 5. Use help for search 6. CMD + Shift + . to hide and unhide files defaults write com.apple.finder AppleShowAllFiles TRUE killall Finder 7. Delete large files 8. Tap on the file name to save it or drag it to a folder to save it 9. Convert a Screenshot to a Jpeg on a Mac defaults write com.apple.screencapture type jpg killall SystemUIServer 10.  Find MacOS download history  sqlite3 ~/Library/Preferences/com.apple.LaunchServices.QuarantineEventsV* 'select LSQuarantineDataURLString from LSQuarantineEvent'  You can clear the history With this command  sqlite3 ~/Library/Preferences/com.apple.LaunchServices.QuarantineEventsV* 'delete from LSQuarantineEvent'   You can reach me here  Website -  YouTube -  Facebook - Twitter -  Instagram -   Which background music did I use?   Cut Trance - Cephelopod by Kevin MacLeod is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution license ( Source:  Artist:    What camera do I use?  Canon 70D  What mike do I use? Blue Yeti and Video Mic pro (depends on requirement)  What tripod do I use? Manfrotto MVKBFR  What video editor do I use? Final Cut Pro  My computer do I use? iMac 2015 for editing and a ThinkPad for casual work
